name: VR Dinosaur Fight
description:
In the game, players can freely walk around the map in browse mode, view prehistoric islands and watch dinosaurs up close. By choosing a dinosaur to fight other dinosaurs, once the battle is won, new dinosaurs can be unlocked.

Simple controls:
You only need to understand the front, back, left and right buttons and the two attack buttons, and launch an attack at the right time to easily defeat the enemy dinosaurs. However, the chances are difficult to grasp, and only powerful players can defeat the enemy dinosaurs.

After entering the game, players can freely walk around the island
Dinosaurs of various groups are randomly distributed on the island
Every dinosaur group has a king who can challenge and attack
Dinosaurs defeated by the player can be operated by the player to fight

How the game works
Dinosaur Fighting Button Instructions

The left handle touchpad button is used to move up, down, left and right, the side button corresponds to the reset position, and the menu button calls out the game menu;
The side buttons on the right handle correspond to turning on or off the laser beam, and the left and right buttons on the touchpad correspond to turning left and right.
